Name: maximize_completed_story_points
Description: Maximize the sum of story points for all user stories completed within a sprint.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average amount of work a team can accomplish in a sprint.

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total estimated effort for all tasks in a sprint to improve efficiency.

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Prioritize and complete features with the highest priority value first.

Name: minimize_number_of_blockers
Description: Minimize the total number of active blockers to ensure a smooth workflow.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the achievement status of sprint goals

Name: minimize_project_timeline
Description: Minimize the project's end date to deliver the product faster.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_relevance
Description: Focus on features that are most relevant to high-influence stakeholders.

Name: minimize_epic_effort
Description: Minimize the total estimated effort for epics by breaking them down effectively.

Name: maximize_release_features
Description: Maximize the number of features included in a given release plan.

Name: maximize_worker_availability
Description: Maximize the overall availability of all workers for task assignment.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the severity of reported blockers to reduce their impact on progress.
